body.title: Project goal
body.text:
The goal of this project was to create a web application dashboard.

We completed this project during my 3rd year at Epitech. It allowed us to get started creating a web application from A to Z and to use vuejs nodejs for the front-end and npm with express for the back-end.

Our dashboard is designed to give you simple access to certain APIs such as: Youtube, Cinema, Weather, Finance

body.title: Services and widgets implemented
body.text:
Each user of our dashboard will be able to connect, add widgets, delete them and save the layout of their dashboard for their next login. They will also be able to name each widget added to their dashboard.

Here is the list of available services and widgets:

  • Youtube: Get information from a Youtube search to have a video
  • Weather: Know the current weather in a city
  • Cinema: Get information on a movie or series
  • Finance: Follow the stock of a company / compare different currencies with each other
